official_title: To designate the federal facility administered by the Bureau of Land Management located at 600 N 350 W in Delta, Utah, as the "Gale V. Bennett Wild Horse and Burro Building".

summary.text: Designates the federal facility administered by the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) located at 600 N 350 W in Delta, Utah, as the "Gale V. Bennett Wild Horse and Burro Building."

titles.title: To designate the federal facility administered by the Bureau of Land Management located at 600 N 350 W in Delta, Utah, as the "Gale V. Bennett Wild Horse and Burro Building".
